wikipedia_page.main: Darren Murray (born 4 February 1976, in Oldham) is a Scottish former professional footballer.

response: Darren Murray (born April 2, 1991 in Cape Town) is a South African swimmer. Qualified for the 2012 Summer Olympics as the first person of colour to represent South Africa in swimming at the Olympics.  He competed in the Men's 200 metre backstroke, finishing in 25th place overall in the heats, failing to qualify for the semifinals.
